text: Khoob jaan rakho kay duniya ki zindagi sirf khel tamasha zeenat aor aapas main fakhar (o-ghuroor) our maal-o-olad main aik ka doosary say apney aap ko ziyadah batlana jaisay barish aur iss ki padawaar kisanon ko achi maloom hota hai phir job woh khushk hojati hai to zard rang main iss ko tum dejhtey ho phir woh bilkul choora choora hojatai hai our aakhirat main sakht azab aur Allah ke maghfirat our razamandi hai our duniya ki zundagi ba-juz dhokay kay saman kay our kuch bhi to nahi
